item.description:
The Event Photographer
Photographs byWalter Finneran
The Griffin Museum at the Aberjona River Gallery
184 Swanton St., Winchester, MA
November 18 - January 30
Opening reception with the artist
Tuesday, January 18, 6-7:30 PM
photo: Â© Walter Finneran

After a long career as an engineer, Walter Finneran found a passion photographing people at events. "People are so dynamic. I love going after the shot looking for the dynamic moment," Finneran says. "I don't have much time to set up a shot and I surely can't do it again if I miss my window of opportunity. Later, when I sit down to finally look at my images I love finding that unexpected surprise of a photograph." Finneran began with photographing events at the Jenks Center in Winchester. His enthusiasm for photography led him to the Griffin Museum eight years ago and he has since photographed all the museum's events. He also shoots events for other organizations in Winchester and Lexington, MA.

The reception is open to all.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Event Photographer Photographs byWalter Finneran (Opening reception)
